BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 060300Z TO 100259Z AUG
   BY M/V WESTERN NEPTUNE TOWING 12 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES AND M/V GECO DIAMOND TOWING
   250 METER LONG CABLE IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-55.48S 039-55.00W, 22-23.18S 040-51.37W,
   22-58.12S 041-15.53W, 23-29.18S 040-21.00W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1486/10.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 100359Z AUG.
